mapper.sql: SELECT e.id, d.id device_id, d.device_name, e.check_Date, (select s.full_name from supplier s where s.id=d.supplier_id) supplier_name, e.storeman, e.assetmanager, e.dept_id, nvl(e.total,0) total, nvl(e.remainder,0) remainder, nvl(e.used,0) used, e.file_name, e.STORE_PATH, d.location_id, d.category_id, e.CREATOR, e.CREATE_DATE FROM device d left join ( select a.ID, a.DEVICE_ID, a.CHECK_DATE, a.STOREMAN, a.ASSETMANAGER, a.DEPT_ID, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_DATE, SUM(b.TOTAL) TOTAL, SUM(b.REMAINDER) REMAINDER, SUM(b.TOTAL-b.REMAINDER) USED, c.FILE_NAME, c.STORE_PATH from DEVICE_SPARE_IN a left join DEVICE_SPARE_IN_DETAIL b on a.ID=b.DEVICE_SPARE_IN_ID left join ATTACHMENT c on a.ID=c.F_ID and MODEL_TYPE=@{_parameter.condition.spareDevice} GROUP BY a.ID, a.DEVICE_ID, a.CHECK_DATE, a.STOREMAN, a.ASSETMANAGER, a.DEPT_ID, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_DATE, c.FILE_NAME, c.STORE_PATH ) e on e.device_id=d.id

SELECT COUNT(d.id) FROM device d left join ( select a.ID, a.DEVICE_ID, a.CHECK_DATE, a.CREATE_DATE, a.STOREMAN, a.ASSETMANAGER, a.DEPT_ID, SUM(b.TOTAL) TOTAL, SUM(b.REMAINDER) REMAINDER, SUM(b.TOTAL-b.REMAINDER) USED, c.FILE_NAME, c.STORE_PATH from DEVICE_SPARE_IN a left join DEVICE_SPARE_IN_DETAIL b on a.ID=b.DEVICE_SPARE_IN_ID left join ATTACHMENT c on a.ID=c.F_ID and MODEL_TYPE=@{_parameter.condition.spareDevice} GROUP BY a.ID, a.DEVICE_ID, a.CHECK_DATE, a.CREATE_DATE, a.STOREMAN, a.ASSETMANAGER, a.DEPT_ID, c.FILE_NAME, c.STORE_PATH ) e on e.device_id=d.id

select top(1)* from DEVICE_SPARE_IN order by id desc

select a.ID, a.DEVICE_ID, d.DEVICE_NAME, s.FULL_NAME supplier_name, a.CHECK_DATE, a.STOREMAN, a.ASSETMANAGER, a.DEPT_ID, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_DATE, c.FILE_NAME, c.STORE_PATH FROM DEVICE_SPARE_IN a left join ATTACHMENT c on a.ID=c.F_ID and MODEL_TYPE=#{modelType} left join device d on d.id=a.device_id LEFT JOIN SUPPLIER S ON D.SUPPLIER_ID=S.ID where a.id=#{id}

select a.ID, a.DEVICE_ID, d.DEVICE_NAME, s.FULL_NAME supplier_name, a.CHECK_DATE, a.STOREMAN, a.ASSETMANAGER, a.DEPT_ID, a.CREATOR, a.CREATE_DATE, c.FILE_NAME, c.STORE_PATH FROM DEVICE_SPARE_IN a left join ATTACHMENT c on a.ID=c.F_ID left join device d on d.id=a.device_id LEFT JOIN SUPPLIER S ON D.SUPPLIER_ID=S.ID where a.DEVICE_ID=#{deviceId}
